adrFormatAddress: 4712 Broadway, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: Envié unas cajas a mi País República Dominicana, y las abrieron y me sacaron varios artículos de las mismas , y cuando llame a la compañía me dijeron que no podían tomar ninguna medida con la pérdida porque habían pasado más de tres días de la entrega y que ya no procedía el reclamo , y que debían de estar todos los artículos enumerados en la factura final para yo poder reclamar y que el reclamo fuera válido !! Me llena de indignación porque eso no te lo dicen cuando van a buscar tus cajas , pero cuando les reclamas a la persona que te entrega en tu país te dicen que fue en aduana que se lo sacaron !! No tienen responsabilidad con los artículos del cliente y no respetan el sacrificó que da poder enviar cajas al país de uno , tenia trees ańos enviando cajas y tanques con ellos. Pero esta fue la ultima vez !! Porque entiendo que se puedan perder cosas ,pero algo muy diferente es que ellos saquen excusas para no responder por ellas .  Yo perdí varios artículos de mi envío , pero la compañía perdió más porque perdieron un cliente y a los que yo podía recomendar como siempre lo hice . No tienen consideración con las personas que mantienen a flote su negocio (clientes ). Le doy una estrella a la compañía porque que solo así me dejaba escribir un comentario . Irresponsables !!

text.text: I sent some boxes to my country, the Dominican Republic, and they opened them and took several items out of them, and when I called the company they told me that they could not take any action with the loss because more than three days had passed since the delivery and that The claim was no longer applicable, and that all the items listed on the final invoice must have been included for me to be able to claim and for the claim to be valid!! It fills me with indignation because they don't tell you that when they go to get your boxes, but when you complain to the person who delivers it to your country they tell you that it was at customs that they took it away!! They have no responsibility with the client's items and do not respect the sacrifice that comes with being able to send boxes to one's country, I had been sending boxes and tanks with them for three years. But this was the last time!! Because I understand that things can be lost, but something very different is that they make excuses not to answer for them. I lost several items from my shipment, but the company lost more because they lost a customer whom I could recommend as I always did. They have no consideration for the people who keep their business afloat (customers). I give the company one star because that's the only way it would let me write a comment. Irresponsible!!

originalText.text: En junio 2022 envíe una televisión Samsung de 65 pulgadas,de la cual me dijeron que llegaba en tres semanas y se tomaron dos meses para la entrega,y cuando me la entregaron no la conectamos inmediatamente,y cuando la encendí no trabajaba,tenía un golpe en la pantalla ,me contacté con ellos , y traté de que me resolvieran y después de mucha espera, perdí todo,no fueron responsables para nada ,son unos estafadores si escrúpulos,cuídeseme de ellos,y no confíen con sus propiedades

text.text: In June 2022 I sent a 65-inch Samsung television, which they told me would arrive in three weeks and it took two months for delivery, and when they delivered it to me we did not connect it immediately, and when I turned it on it did not work, it had a knock on the screen, I contacted them, and tried to get them to solve me and after a long wait, I lost everything, they were not responsible at all, they are scammers if they are scrupulous, take care of them, and do not trust them with their properties

originalText.text: Envie un panque a mi paiz Republica Dominicana lo abrieron sacaron todo lo que les dio la gana la verdad son unos rateros .

text.text: I sent a pancake to my country, Dominican Republic, they opened it, they took out whatever they wanted, the truth is, they are thieves.

originalText.text: Excelente, el trato fué cordial y amable, y contestó todas mis preguntas. Voy s enviar unas cajas a mi país República Dominicana.

text.text: Excellent, the treatment was cordial and kind, and he answered all my questions. I'm going to send some boxes to my country Dominican Republic.
